pageContext.claim: “We have tremendous support in the House. And, by the way -- you know, they say, "Oh, is it true that somebody -- you know, a congressman, he broke away?" Let me tell you -- yeah, every once in a while, you're going to have that. But you know who else has that? The Democrats have that too, because they have their people breaking away too.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump may be mixing up this current House of Representatives - which is controlled by Democrats - with the last one. Democrats generally don't support the border wall or Trump's immigration policy. In other words, he does not have "tremendous support in the House."
